title: Vivo Nex S Teardown - Battle of the Pop Up Cameras!
description: The Vivo Nex S and the Oppo Find X Both have motorized cameras. But does the size of the motor matter? Which motorized camera is more durrable? The Oppo Find X or the Vivo Nex S? The only way to find out is to teardown the Vivo Nex S and review the motors side by side with the Oppo Find X.  The only place to see a teardown like this is right here on JerryRigEverything.   In this video we teardown the Vivo Nex S. I will disassemble the Nex S and show how each of the components come out of the frame. Including the piezoelectric earpiece, along with the super small vibrator of the Nex S and the in screen fingerprint scanner for the new Nex phones.
